msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; the names and the Persons of the Trinity; the names of the owner or donor. A few lines (in groups of two) alternating with black lines in the incipit page of the text; incipit of each daily prayer and each miracle; the Trinitarian formula. Some words (a few times only some letters), e.g.: ʾaʾattǝb, ʾaḫattǝm, ʾǝsäggǝd, ʾaʾammǝn, tämaḫḍänku, sälam lä-, sǝbḥat lä-; the name of the Hebrew letters esp. in Texts I-1 and I-8; some words interlineally and the dashes above and below the immediate corrections in the text. The names of the days in the margins; quire marks or their elements. Elements of the Ethiopic numbers and of the punctuation signs.

msItem.note: I) Säyfä Śǝllase “Sword of the Trinity” (fols. 5ra-76vb):
I-1) Introduction (fols. 5ra-10ra) (በስመ፡’’… ንጽሕፍ፡ መቅድመ፡ ሰይፈ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ዘ፯ዕለታት፡ ተማኅፀንኩ፡ ብክሙ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ በከመ፡ አተውክሙ፡ ውስተ፡ ቤተ፡ አብርሃም፡…)
I-2) - Prayer for Monday (fols. 10ra-17ra) (በስመ፡’’… እነቅሕ፡ በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፨ እትነሣእ፡ በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አአትብ፡…)
- Miracle 1 (fols. 17ra-18rb): The promises of the Persons of the Trinity to the faithful (ተአምራቲሆሙ፡... ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ይቤ፡ አብ፡ ዘአክበረኒ፡ በምድር፡ አነ፡ አከብሮ፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት።…)
I-3) - Prayer for Tuesday (fols. 18rb-25va) (በስመ፡’’… መለኮተ፡ ሥሉስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አኃትም፡ አኃትዎ፡ ከዋላየ: በመለኮተ፡ ሥሉስ፡ ቅዱስ፡…)
- Miracle 2 (fols. 25va-26va): The demons inside the beer (ተአምሪሆሙ፡... ወሀሎ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ውስተ፡ ሀገረ፡ ፍልስጥኤም፡ ወረሰየ፡ ምዝረ፡ በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ለገቢረ፡ ተዝካሮሙ፡ ወመጽኡ፡ ብዙኃን፡ ሰይጣናት፡ …)
I-4) - Prayer for Wednesday (fols. 26va-31va) (አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱ[ስ፡] ኅቡረ፡ ህላዌ፡ ሥሉስ፡ በተገጽዎ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፤ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ በጽማሬ፡ ሥሉስ፡…)

- Miracle 3 (fols. 31va-32rb): The governor angry with his troops who were doing the commemoration of the Trinity (ተአምራቲሆሙ፡... ወሀሎ፡ ፩መኰንን፡ በሀገረ፡ ፍልስጥኤም፡ አዘዘ፡ ከመ፡ ይትጋብኡ፡ ሠራዊቱ፡ ሶበ፡ ርእየ፡ መኰንን፡ ከመ፡ ተጋብኡ፡ ሠራዊቱ፡ ይቤሎሙ፡ ዘገብረ፡ ተዝካሮሙ፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡...)
I-5) - Prayer for Thursday (fols. 32rb-38vb) (አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ በግፃዌ፡ ሥሉስ፡ በሥላሴ፤ ግፅው፡ ዋህድ፡ አምላክ፡ ፫አዕማደ፡ ብርሃን፡…)
- Miracle 4 (fols. 38vb-40ra): The promise of the God Father to the faithful (ተአምራቲሆሙ፡... ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ቦኡ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ውስተ፡ ጽርኃ፡ አርያም፡ ወሰረሩ፡ በውስተ፡ መናብርቲሆሙ፡ ለፌ፡ ወለፌ፡...)
I-6) - Prayer for Friday (fols. 40ra-52ra) (በስመ፡’’… አይ፡ ልሳን፡ ወአይ፡ ከናፍር፡ ዘይክል፡ ነቢበ፡ ዕበየ፨ ክብሮሙ፡ ለሥሉስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አይ፡ ልቡና፡…)
- Miracle 5 (fols. 52ra-53rb): The words of the Trinity toward the faithful (ተአምሪሆሙ፡... ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ ቦኡ፡ ውስተ፡ ሀገርፈ[sic]፡ ፈለገ፡ ጸቃውዕ፡ ወተናገሩ፡ ነገረ፡ ጥቀ፨ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ እንዘ፡ ይብሉ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ቃልነ፡ ...)
I-7) - Prayer for Saturday (fols. 53rb-59vb) (በስመ፡’’… ሰላም፡ ለፍቅረ፡ መለኮት፡ በትስብእቱ፡ ዘጾመ፡ እንበይነ፡ ዚአነ፡…)
- Miracle 6 (fols. 59vb-61ra): The God Father announces the future Reign of the Trinity (ተአምራቲሆሙ፡... ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ አተዉ፡ ገጸ፡ አርያም፡ አብኒ፡ ጊዜ፡ ይመጽእ፡ ቃልየ፡ ሀለወኒ፡ ወይትሊዓል[sic]፡ በመዓዝናት። ይእዜሰ፡ ዘተለዓለ፡ ቃለ፡ ሰማዕት…)
I-8) - Prayer for Sunday (fols. 61rb-73ra) (በስመ፡’’… አኃሥሥ፡ ዘእምኀቤከ፡ ጽድቀ፡ አቀመኒ፡ ጽድቅ፨ አኃሥሥ፡ ጥበበ፡ እምአከ፡…)
- Miracle 7 (fols. 73ra-75rb): The Saviour Jesus Christ resurrects the children fallen off (ተአምራቲሆሙ፡... ወአሐተ፡ ዕለተ፡ እንዘ፡ ይትለሐይ፡ ምስለ፡ ሕፃናት፡ በናዕሱ፡ ከመ፡ ደቂቅ፡ እስመ፡ ተመሰለ፡ ሰብአ፡ በኵሉ፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ኃጢአት፡ ባሕቲታ፡…)
I-9) Concluding prayer (fols. 75rb-76vb) (በስመ፡’’… አአምን፡ ዘንተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ በሰብሐ፡ ለዘይፃረረኒ፡ ተመኪሖ፨ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይፍርሆ፨ ወሰይፈ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ፍጡነ፡ ይንጽሖ፨…).

- Cp. Mss. StrANL Conti Rossini 53 (StrANL 154-57) and Vat. Aeth. 177 (GréTisVat I, 637-42). The text ofKTM-012is arranged in the same way, i.e. each daily prayer is followed by a miracle; besides, the miracles and the prayers are the same, with the exception of the miracle for Sunday (Miracle 7) and the concluding prayer (Text I-9).
For the same miracles (except Sunday), s. also Ms. Vat. Aeth. 180 (GréTisVat I, 644-45).
- Probably influence of Amharic or Tǝgrǝñña in some words: e.g., እጅ (fol. 8va) and ኸቢካኤል (fol. 72ra).
- Exchange of laryngeal; s., e.g., አአትብ, instead of አዐትብ (e.g., fols. 10va, 10vb, 11rb).

supportDesc.condition: The front board is broken and the back board is missing. Some fols. are affected by humidity or water (e.g., fol. 69v). The front board shows traces of repair (two holes, one of them with metal wire, at the right edge).

layout.ab: the number of the lines is irregular and changes between 14 and 19
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The layout (number, setting and orientation of the ruled lines, space between them, width of the columns space) is not uniform; the scribe often disregarded the ruling (e.g., fol. 74v).
One or two bottom lines have not been used by the scribe in fols. 5r, 5v, 8r, 19r, 20r, 22ra, 22ra, 23r, 23vb, 53r, 54r, 74r.
Fols. 41v, 42rv, 43rv, 44rv, 47rv, 48v, 54rv have an additional ruled line in the upper or bottom margins.

handDesc.handNote: The quality of the handwriting changes: the space between the letters, the sloping, of the number of the written and ruled lines, etc.
Some letters (e.g., ለ ነ ፈ) have hairlines at the top almost parallel to the base line; for ግ the hairline is more extended (s. e.g., fols. 51va, 61ra).

In fols. 5ra-6vb (other hand?) the hand appears slightly different: the letters seem written with a thicker pen nib and more curved strokes, are less spaced, uniformly right-sloping, and with a constant presence of hairlines at the top.
